author: mmascher
body:
REST changes includes:
- Support for LHE workflows (new parameter and new column added)
- Better handling of transfering files (aso_status file is retrieved from schedd and )
- Return exit code for failed jobs (retrieve error_summary file from schedd)
- Accept list of couh databases for ASOURL

Details of the release available at: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/CRAB3Releases
title: CRAB3 server client taskworker 3.3.11.rc1
